column1: 2;oil_pastel;Oil Pastel;Oil pastel (also called wax oil crayon) is a painting and drawing medium with characteristics similar to pastels and wax crayons. Unlike "soft" or "Japanese" pastel sticks
column2: which are made with a gum or methyl cellulose binder
column3: oil pastels consist of pigment mixed with a non-drying oil and wax binder. The surface of an oil pastel painting is therefore less powdery
column4: but more difficult to protect with a fixative.
